content: वेशः [विश्-घञ्] {@--1@} Entrance. {@--2@} Ingress, access. {@--3@} A house, dwelling. {@--4@} A house or residence of prostitutes; तरुणजनसहायश्चिंत्यतां वेशवासः <ls>Mk. 1. 31.</ls> {@--5@} Dress, apparel (also written वेष in this sense); मृग यावेषधारी; विनीतवेषेण <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; कृतवेशे केशवे <ls>Gīt. 11.</ls> {@--6@} Disguise. {@--7@} Hire, wages.
